title: Looking for Chance Cycle 460 from eBay
author: JerryTotino

posts.post_title: Looking for Chance Cycle 460 from eBay
posts.post_content:
I didn't see the below Chance Batting Cycle 460 listed on eBay until after the listing had already ended. If someone on Net54 won this card please let me know if you would like to work something out. I need it for my Cycle 460 subset.

[url]mmw2161@aol.com[/url]

Thanks in advance.

Jerry

Great card....i hate when that happens!!! i feel your pain....good luck on quest:)

peace

johnny
hopefully lee won it for his set, or a double for trade bait.

I'm still looking to see if I can find the current owner of this card.

Thanks in advance.

Jerry
You know, Lee is a great guy...but so is Jerry. I hope he finds one soon for HIS set.

[quote name="Gradedcardman" post=1118632]You know, Lee is a great guy...but so is Jerry. I hope he finds one soon for HIS set.[/QUOTE]
